```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

Load Required Packages
```{r}
library(tsibble)
library(fable)
library(fabletools)
library(tidyverse)
library(feasts)
library(forecast)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
```

Read in Data and Clean
```{r}
st_pass <- read_csv("steelhead_passage.csv") %>% 
  clean_names()

st_clean <- st_pass %>% 
  unite(yymm, c(mm_dd, year), remove = FALSE) %>% 
  mutate(dd)




stpass_mod <- read_csv("steelhead_passage.csv") %>%
  mutate(mthday = lubridate::parse_date_time(mmdd, "dm")) %>%
  mutate(mth = month(mthday),
         day = day(mthday)) %>%
  select(-mmdd, -mthday) %>%
  mutate(datatype = str_to_lower(datatype))

View(stpass_mod)
```

```{r}
steelead_clean <- stpass_mod %>%
  group_by(mth, year)

steelead_ym
```
